title: Fix ralph-ui flickering with Ink Static component
description: The live UI flickers badly because the entire component tree re-renders on each poll. Per docs.local/live-ui-research/round-3-agent-9-synthesis.md, we need to use Ink's <Static> component for stable content and batch updates (50 lines or 100ms).

acceptanceCriteria.text: Understand: Static component, batching pattern, dual-stream
Wrap stable UI elements (header, borders) in <Static>
Only dynamic elements (time, progress, indicators) re-render
Batch state updates: 50 lines OR 100ms, whichever first
Test with rapid file changes - still stable
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: fix: BUG-030 eliminate UI flickering with Static component
